sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Role } from 'src/app/interfaces/role'; import { RoleService } from 'src/app/services/role/role.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-roles', templateUrl: './roles.component.html', styleUrls: ['./roles.component.css'] }) export class RolesComponent implements OnInit { roles!: Role[]; constructor(public roleService:RoleService) { } async ngOnInit(): Promise { this.roles = await this.roleService.getRoles().toPromise(); } }
